post.summary: Take the config DB backup now by providing the name of the backup,repository name and encryption key. The API returns the task ID. Use the Task Service status API to get the status of the backup job
post.description: Triggers on demand configuration backup on the ISE node. The API returns the task ID. Use the Task Service status API to get the status of the backup job.

202.description: Config DB backup task initiated. Please use Task Service status API to get the status of the backup job.

post.description: Cancels the backup job running on the node.

200.description: The config backup job got canceled successfully.
Provides the status of last backup.

post.summary: Restore a config DB backup by giving the name of the backup file, repository name and encryption key. The API returns the task ID. Use the Task Service status API to get the status of the restore job
post.description: Triggers a configuration DB restore job on the ISE node. The API returns the task ID. Use the Task Service status API to get the status of the backup job

202.description: Config DB restore task initiated. Please use Task Service status API to get the status of the restore job.

put.description: Update the Schedule of the configuration backup on the ISE node as per the input parameters. This API only helps in editing the schedule.

200.description: The config backup job got scheduled successfully.

post.summary: Schedules the configuration backup on the ISE node as per the input parameters.
post.description: Schedules the configuration backup on the ISE node as per the input parameters. This API helps in creating the schedule for the first time.

200.description: The config backup job got scheduled successfully.

id.description: Id which can be used to track the status of backup / restore of config DB.

message.example: Config DB backup task initiated. Please use Task Service status API to get the status of the backup job

backupEncryptionKey.description: The encyption key for the backed up file. Encryption key must satisfy the following criteria - Contains at least one uppercase letter [A-Z], Contains at least one lowercase letter [a-z], Contains at least one digit [0-9], Contain only [A-Z][a-z][0-9]_#, Has at least 8 characters, Has not more than 15 characters, Must not contain 'CcIiSsCco', Must not begin with

backupName.description: The backup file will get saved with this name.

repositoryName.description: Name of the configured repository where the generated backup file will get copied.

error.description: Error message. False in case of no error

hostName.description: Hostname where the job has executed

justComplete.description: Whether the job completed now. Possible values - Yes, No

message.description: detail message in case of exception
message.example: Backup Failed Cancelled by user / Backup Failed Copy to repository failed

name.description: Backup name given at the time of scheduling the job.

percentComplete.description: shows the percent completion of the job. Possible value range  1 - 100

repository.description: configured repository selected for the backup / restore job

scheduled.description: last action performed with respect to backup job. Possible values- BACKUP , CANCEL

startDate.description: Start date of the backup job

backupEncryptionKey.description: The encryption key which was provided at the time of taking backup.

repositoryName.description: Name of the configred repository where the backup file exists.

restoreFile.description: Name of the backup file to be restored on ISE node.

restoreIncludeAdeos.description: Determines whether the ADE-OS configure is restored. Possible values true, false

message.description: Response message on successful scheduling the backup job.
message.example: The config backup job got scheduled successfully

backupDescription.example: backup description like configuration backup daily

backupEncryptionKey.description: The encyption key for the backed up file. Encryption key must satisfy the following criteria - Contains at least one uppercase letter [A-Z], Contains at least one lowercase letter [a-z], Contains at least one digit [0-9], Contain only [A-Z][a-z][0-9]_#, Has at least 8 characters, Has not more than 15 characters, Must not contain 'CcIiSsCco', Must not begin with

backupName.description: The backup file will get saved with this name.

endDate.description: End date of the scheduled backup job. Allowed format MM/DD/YYYY. End date is not required in case of ONE_TIME frequency.

monthDay.description: Day of month you want backup to be performed on when scheduled frequency is MONTHLY. Allowed values - from 1 to 28.

repositoryName.description: Name of the configured repository where the generated backup file will get copied.

startDate.description: Start date for scheduling the backup job. Allowed format MM/DD/YYYY.

time.description: Time at which backup job get scheduled. example- 12:00 AM
